title: Teaching and Learning in the Age of A.I.
description: Readers discuss the adoption of artificial intelligence tools in schools. Also: President Trump’s “Board of Peace”; an anti-ICE slogan.
content:
To the Editor:
Re “Tech Giants Racing to Add A.I. to Schools Around the World” (Business, Jan. 5):

title: Elon Musk's Bombshell At Davos
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk, who joined BlackRock CEO Larry Fink on a panel at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, predicted that artificial intelligence would become smarter than humans by the end of 2026.
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk, who joined BlackRock CEO Larry Fink on a panel at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, predicted that artificial intelligence would become smarter than humans by the end of 2026 and surpass the collective intelligence ... [1796 chars]

title: The ‘off switch’ is an illusion: Why ‘Godfather of AI’ Geoffrey Hinton thinks we have already lost control of it
description: Geoffrey Hinton, the “Godfather of AI,” warns that the AI off switch is an illusion and humanity may be losing control of artificial intelligence.
content:
The “Godfather of AI,” Geoffrey Hinton has a confession to make. He says he feels deep regret about the technology he helped build. Speaking to Business Insider via an interview aired on BBC Newsnight,

title: MSU to offer AI studies across all majors amid push for digital-ready workforce
description: Michigan State University is making a major push to build students’ digital skills, especially in artificial intelligence.
content:
Michigan State University is making a major push to build students’ digital skills, especially in artificial intelligence.
Plans are underway to integrate AI in every major area of study, starting with a foundational course this fall.
